# tile()

**Instance Method**

Lays out the components of the receiver: the content view, the scrollers, and the ruler views.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func tile()
```

## Discussion

You rarely need to invoke this method, but subclasses may override it to manage additional components.
title: tile()
